summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Valentine's Day proposal website for Junnu. All critical interactive features working perfectly, including the impossible-to-click 'No' button behavior.
passed_tests: Initial proposal screen displays correctly with 'Junnu, will you be my Valentine? üíù' heading
Floating hearts animation (20 hearts) working in background
Baby pink and red gradient background displays correctly
CRITICAL: 'No' button moves away on mouseover event - working perfectly
CRITICAL: 'No' button moves away on mousedown/click attempts - working perfectly
'No' button is impossible to actually click - confirmed (even Playwright can't click it)
'Yes' button grows larger each time 'No' button escapes
Pleading messages appear and cycle through correctly mentioning 'Junnu'
Success screen displays 'I knew it, Junnu! üíï' correctly
Success screen shows romantic messages personalized for Junnu
Heart explosion animation (30 hearts) on success screen working
Confetti/hearts falling animation (50 hearts) on success screen working
